column1:
Know what ya get when ya throw a lot of books in the ocean?

A title wave!

#WhiteboardJokeOfTheDay
math books are always upset, because they are full of problems!
even elves to gnomework after school!
did I tell you the joke about a broken pencil?  There was no point really
know what eighty did when it got hungry?  88!
50 ran a race but 51
Most potatoes hate Friday!

Ok, why did the ELEPHANT cross the road?

The chicken deserves a day off too!
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
What do you call a fish who wears a crown? The king of the coral-iculum!
Why was the math book sad after the test? It had too many X's and not enough Y's.
Why did the teacher wear sunglasses to school? Because her students were so bright!
Why don't plants like math? Because it gives them square roots!
What do you call a pencil that can do arithmetic? A calculator-cil!
What did the computer say to the student? "You can count on me for answers!"
Why did the student eat his homework? Because the teacher said it was a piece of cake!
Why did the music teacher need a ladder? To reach the high scores!
What do you call a teacher who never smiles? A "testy" teacher!
Why was the math book sad after summer vacation? It forgot all the problems it had.
Why did the student bring a ladder to the library? Because he wanted to climb the "bestsellers" list!
What do you call a pencil that can solve math problems? A "smarty pencil"!
What did the pencil say to the eraser? "You're my number one, without you, I'm pointless!"
How do you catch a squirrel studying? Climb a tree and act like a nut!
My son’s math teacher called him average. I just think he’s mean.
I find white boards interesting They’re quite remarkable.

Why did the math book go to an orthopedist? 

Because the answers are in the back.

The first day of school, I signed up for English, Math, Science, and Geography. 


The rest, as they say, is history.
